resources.string: Show home to record dose and sleep time.
Tap to edit, Swipe to delete.
If you set medicine\nquantity and adjustment,\ntap to adjust by 5step.
Tap buttons to record now time.\n Long tap to show time picker.
Move log view to check record dose, sleep and awake time.
Tap time to modify date and time.
Tap icon to save log text file.
